objects.description: [BeaverTail](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1246) has searched for .ldb and .log files stored in browser extension directories for collection and exfiltration.(Citation: Socket BeaverTail XORIndex HexEval Contagious Interview July 2025)(Citation: Socket HexEval BeaverTail Contagious Interview June 2025)(Citation: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025)
